extension.summary: Watch any dubbed anime for free
extension.description: Watch any dubbed and subbed anime shows/movies for free
extension.disclaimer: Dubbed Anime addon is a web scraper coded to crawl and index dubbedanime.net. This addon doesn't host any content therefore ReasonsRepo is not responsible for the accuracy, compliance, copyright, legality, decency, or any other aspect of the content from the scraped sites.

extension.description: BD MovieZone is a popular site to watch Bengali,Hindi and English Movies for free
extension.disclaimer: This addon searches BDMovieZone.com to find movie link. The addon itself doesn't host any content.
extension.news: [B]Version 0.1.2 - 27 May 2018[/B]- Fixed Menu, Fixed Playback issues, Removed BDMovieZone Links
extension.broken: Site seems to have a lot of dead links

extension.summary: Entertainment from the Deccan region of India
extension.description: This addon provides access to entertainment in various Deccan languages such as Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam, Kannada, and Hindi DeccanDelight is and always will be free and open-source. None of its code and resources may be sold or redistributed for any commercial purposes. DeccanDelight and its developers [B]DO NOT[/B] host, create, or distribute any of the content displayed in the addon, it simply scrapes ad financed public websites.
extension.disclaimer: DeccanDelight and its developers are not in any way affiliated with Kodi or any of the sites and providers used in the addon.
extension.news: [B]Version 1.7.1 - 21st Dec 2018[/B] - [COLOR blue]Reasons[/COLOR] [COLOR yellow]Repository[/COLOR] - Added Desi Serials

extension.description:
This XBMC plugin allows to watch Hindi and Tamil movies from Einthusan.com. Please support them. Fixed everything, the addon should be working fine now [COLOR blue]Reasons[/COLOR] [COLOR yellow]Repository[/COLOR].
Credits to Humla for creating the addon, but he probably stopped supporting it, so I, [COLOR blue]Reasons[/COLOR] [COLOR yellow]Repository[/COLOR] am taking over this project. I don't watch bollywood movies so dont use this addon, so if it breaks then please let me know. My contact info is available on my website or my github Repository. Credits to suriya222 for the thumbnails.
Movie Rulz is a popular site to watch English and Hindi Movies for free
extension.disclaimer: This addon searches movierulz.pe to find movie link. The addon itself doesn't host any content. For now, we have no plan on adding Telegue or other language links in this addon.

extension.description: This is a brand new addon for fmovies.to
extension.disclaimer: fMovies addon is created by ReasonsRepo, this addon do not host or upload any videos or movies other than indexing them.Therefore, ReasonsRepo is not responsible for the accuracy, compliance, copyright, legality, decency, or any other aspect of the content from the scraped sites.
extension.news: [B]Version 1.0.5 - 27 June 2018[/B] - Added an option to play latest episode (just a temporary fix), also added an option in settings to change site url (currenyly only 2 sites are supported)

extension.description: This is a brand new addon to watch movies from HDVIX.com

extension.news: [B]Version 1.0.10 - 23 June 2018[/B] - Fixed No links issue, Added page count, Removed Dandymedia's name due to his request.
